system.biography: The Razorback was originally intended for sale to corp drone security staffers, but gangs and operators have come to love its ability to deploy multiple drones while hauling a team of combatants. Most buyers install extra cargo space or upgrade the vehicles armor, though a few owners turn these trucks into mobile homes.

system.description: Install a housing that can hold a portable drone on Small vehicles or a non-portable drone on Medium or larger vehicles. The drone can be deployed while the vehicle is in motion. Onboard signal encryption adds +2 to the difficulty of hacking any drone controlled by someone in or adjacent to this vehicle. This fitting can be installed twice on Large vehicles.
